== Kadakkavoor (628471) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Kadakkavoor is a village in the [[Chirayinkeezhu]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 532 hectares and harbouring 5144 households with total population of 22632 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Attingal]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 10880 and female population is 11752. Scheduled Caste Population is 1641 and Scheduled Tribes population is 33. Census Location Code of the village is 628471<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 17739 (78.38%)
* Literate male population: 8484 (77.98%)
* Literate female population: 9255 (78.75%)
